website_summaries.verdict: Offers excellent, waterproof coverage, but the downside is that it might emphasize lines. Applying a minimal amount and blending it well may help.
pros: Delivers reliable coverage for dark circles, blemishes, and other imperfections
Waterproof formula stands up to moisture
cons: Although it's suppose to be anti-aging, it has the tendency to settle in fine lines if you apply too much

customer_reviews.title: Read product details carefully
customer_reviews.text: So, I wanted to replace my previous Bye Bye Under Eye concealer and the product photo matched exactly the one above. I thought the price was very good. But, when I got the product in it looks nothing like the one above and was much smaller and had a little clear area of the tube that shows the color of the product inside. The difference? The amount of product. My old tube was .88 and this is .11. This leaves me wondering if this retailer is using the photo of the larger product to sell the smaller size. Let the buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Joan P.

customer_reviews.title: This concealer is the worst!!
customer_reviews.text: this concealer did the exact opposite of what a concealer should do. Not only was is heavy and cakey, it made whatever imperfections I have more noticeable. Also, for the price, the tube I received was a "trial size" at best. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: kimd

customer_reviews.title: Costly but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I will admit, a lot of $$ for such a small tube... BUT... a little goes a long way... I’ve been searching for something that will give me full coverage for my under eye circles and this definitely did the job. I definitely foresee this lasting me a while. I’m going to try and look for this same tube but with better price and for more but if I can’t this will drift let be a continuous buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: heidy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to other reviews I find this product easy to use, long lasting and does not cake, crinkle or settle into my fine lines. It's fantastic though a little too pricey, but worth it!! I put a little between thumb and forefinger, rub gently to mix and warm, then apply. I have very dark circles and fine lines that irritate me, but this works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Ninochka

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great results
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this concealer for years. Covers dark circles and sun spots. Makes your skin look flawless! Will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkpetunia

customer_reviews.title: Best ever! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the it lights up your skin. You can use it on your own eyes and any other place on your face you want to conceal it brings light to your face .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, just not happy that I paid twice the amount for a TRIAL SIZE than I would have if I had went thru Ulta! Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fluharty

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Look how tiny this is for all that money. I was thinking it was what I had before, buyer beware! It’s a tiny trial size!! Won’t order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Landa Perry

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It helps me look rested (when I haven’t been) and I’ve had quite a few compliments on how “good” I look since I started using it. It is on the higher coverage side. Some days I add a drop of eye cream to it. I have minimal lines but doesn’t seem to settle in them. I add a slight touch of power as well. I am fairEr/pinker toned skin (slight tan) and ordered the medium. Works well but I will be ordering the light as and mixing the two as summer is ending.
customer_reviews.author: T.D.

customer_reviews.title: Magical
customer_reviews.text: This under eye concealer is a must have. It really brightens up my look.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Makeup Scam?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product at a local beauty store and loved it! I repurchased through Amazon and feel as if it’s not the same product whatsoever. The original concealer was lightweight, covering dark circles pretty well, and didn’t leave my under eyes with a creased look after a few hours of wear. The concealer purchased here however seemed stickier, hardly covered my circles, and made my under eyes look older even when I wasn’t wearing it! With the amount of makeup dupes sold on the internet, I’m worried this is one of them. I would not recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Adams

customer_reviews.title: Gooey, Does Not Apply Well
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this concealer a try, since my other concealer was discontinued. I was not impressed with the concealer. It is very gooey and sticky. The concealer is suppose to conceal those fine lines/wrinkles, but it actually shows them more after the concealer is applied. It actually looks caked on. Very disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: sbrady

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS! My under eye blue shadows hate this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Ok...so you're going to say it's a bit pricey and you're going to say, " I paid 20 bucks for such a small tube?"...but IT WORKS!!!! I use a dab of eye cream and the TINIEST dab of this wonderful stuff, blend it in and there you go!!! Finally! Something that doesn't look like spackle and it works!
customer_reviews.author: jgbunny

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST COVERAGE
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but this is the best coverage I've ever had for my very, very dark circles. You may discouraged when you see the size of the tube but don't be! That tiny little tube has lasted me an ENTIRE YEAR and it's not even completely empty yet. Amazing product! 10/10 reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size is absurd!
customer_reviews.text: This is sooo tiny, so when used I will be lucky if get three uses from it, and I do not understand why this would be coming from anyone but the company that manufactures this product. It is not expensive but i see why it is not. Its a joke right?
customer_reviews.author: Sherry D. Huegel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money for the sample size
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I opened my package and notice what I paid $20.00 for was for a sample size which I would receive in my $10.00 a month Ipsy package or even something free at a store ... very disappointed and would never order this product from amazon again . This product size should definitely be removed from amazon . This size product get zero stars
customer_reviews.author: javier

customer_reviews.title: Super Thick and Hard to Apply
customer_reviews.text: This came out of the tube like wood putty. Really thick and very hard to smooth under eye area. So thick that it pulls the skin as you smooth it out with a make-up sponge or brush. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rusanthony

customer_reviews.title: My fav
customer_reviews.text: I like This product a lot. I know some people have issues with it. But you need a got primer before using it. And a good setting powder for after applying it. Covers up my bags good.
customer_reviews.author: Zuleyka

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong w/ “ It “products
customer_reviews.text: I’m a senior who doesn’t like a heavy made up look but don’t want to look washed out either. I dot ByeBye Under Eye & smooth on my face for an ultra sheer foundation after I moisturize. Then top with It w/ pressed powder and blush. Add mascara and lipstick and I’m a happy “ It “ Girl. Lol great products. Great coverage for all my imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Sissie Karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and really covers my dark circles. After using it, people commented I look so “ healthy “
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Campion

customer_reviews.title: Really works for dark circles
customer_reviews.text: This product really works for dark circles and a little bit goes a long way I will def. add this to my daily cosmetics
customer_reviews.author: emily_grandusky

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered this product many times, and have used it for a few years now. It's my favorite concealer. I've tried others, none compare.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH J. LAFOUNTAIN

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a flawless appearance
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite concelar because i have pigmentation and bags underneath my eyes. This concelar goes on smooth and makes your skin look flawless. You only need to use what works for you, and depends on the blemishes you are trying to cover. Or if you have no blemishes then you only need a tiny bit to give you the look you are looking for. It works great for me and i will continue to use this product and brand.
customer_reviews.author: angelica gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: This ad is deceiving...this product is 1/4 the size of the normal one I usually purchase at the store. I should have known the price was too good to be true. I can buy a much larger size for $5 more in store. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Carolbee

customer_reviews.title: Opposite results of advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I got this under eye concealer because I’m so self conscious of my creases that i have. This says no crease and it is the worst for wrinkles and creases. It’s so thick that you can’t even touch it up or fix it once it’s on for more than one minute. HIGHLY do NOT recommend. Although if you’re just looking for a blemish cover such as sun spots or pimples this might be a good choice. Also did not realize the size for the price. NARS is way better.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian U.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing at covering up the dark circles under my eyes! Also a little bit goes a long way so it takes me awhile to go through the tube
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer for me.
customer_reviews.text: It works really good for me, The best that I've used in a long time. Just wish it was a bigger tube. 8
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: TINY
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this same product at 3 x's it's size for the same price at many stores. Way to small for the price.
customer_reviews.author: judy

customer_reviews.title: So far like it
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it but so far like it..Just a little bit of it goes a long ways and goes on smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!! It lasts a while and is totally worth the price! Will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Portie

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure this makeup is counterfeit. Smells funny, feels sticky and stays sticky once applied. Creates the worst breakouts imaginable. **Do Not Buy This Particular Product**
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Coe

customer_reviews.title: Too oily
customer_reviews.text: I had seen my sister using this product, but unfortunately didn’t work for me ;(
customer_reviews.author: Jane Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Flawless coverage
customer_reviews.text: I use this concealer for covering under eye circles. I like the thickness and texture but it does tend to cause some dark marks from mascara. I’m not sure if it’s the fault of my mascara or this product. Otherwise I’m very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage. Very thick. Helps if you use a moisturizer underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Best under eye concealer I’ve ever used. Use with a damp sponge
customer_reviews.author: DAWN M SHERRILL

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: bought this in the past and it was great. this one was watered down and provided no coverage. i dont know if it was old or what, but will just buyfrom a local store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product and service
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that I’ve used before and like a lot. It is reasonably priced and does a better job than many higher priced items. The seller is also wonderful. There was an issue before and when I contacted the seller she addressed the problem within hours. A great product and great seller.
customer_reviews.author: karen h levine

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. Keeps my under eyes a bit brighter. Takes some practice on applying it but stays in place. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it’s just ok
customer_reviews.text: i didn’t like it as well as another i had purchased
customer_reviews.author: ADi

customer_reviews.title: Love this will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer I have ever used will buy again !!!
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna Shay Price

customer_reviews.title: Great price, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It covers allot. Just a tad goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Strickler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to hide ANYTHING on your face... This cream is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Aron & Tanya Sandquist

customer_reviews.title: Expected more
customer_reviews.text: Color was too light and didn’t conceal like it was supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ward

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer.. especially with a wet makeup sponge.. it looks so bright and natural!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gustavson

customer_reviews.title: Works fabulously
customer_reviews.text: This works well. I love it. Thank you for replacing the lost order that disappeared from my porch in the wind storm.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Awful product
customer_reviews.text: VERY thick and pasty, making it difficult to apply. Settled into fine lines. Have always loved IT cosmetics. I do not recommend. The next day I developed a painful lump under eye area where I applied it. Maybe it was a fake product?! Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: William Sands

customer_reviews.title: Sample sized
customer_reviews.text: Sample size. In store full size is only a few dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle James

customer_reviews.title: A great product, albeit pricey....
customer_reviews.text: Seriously one of my faves now....will treat it like gold cos I splurged on this....love this line
customer_reviews.author: JaceeBee

customer_reviews.title: Best under eye concealer ever!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! I only need a tiny drop and that's all I need for coverage on both of my eyelids/under eye. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: It was OK, didn’t notice a big difference
customer_reviews.text: Quite expensive for such a small tube. It was ok...
customer_reviews.author: Shavaun

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye under eye
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I’m very fair and my darker circle under eyes are almost invisible with this makeup! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet product expectations as advertised. It acted like any ordinary foundation. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Best Under Eye Cover
customer_reviews.text: I have used them all. I like this one best.
customer_reviews.author: karole cooney

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Concealer
customer_reviews.text: Really love this concealer. It’s full coverage and makes any bags or dark circles disappear. No dryness which I love, and love the crazy formula.
customer_reviews.author: dschwalm

customer_reviews.title: What dark circles?
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the coverage of dark eye circles and other areas of sun spots on my face. It is a small tube..but mighty!
customer_reviews.author: jdy

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage for facial discolorations. Just make sure you get the right color. Going lighter works better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Stephens

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: A little deceiving in the pic about the size but it does exactly what it says!
customer_reviews.author: GettIn0DllRz$

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Covers dark circles and blemishes very well. Small drop on your finger, then cover with your thumb to warm prior to applying to face. Covers a large area very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra T.

customer_reviews.title: Small Sized
customer_reviews.text: It's the small Sze. You can get full size tube for a little more at ulta
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Miss
customer_reviews.text: I love the foundation, but this was a miss for me. It’s super heavy and doesn’t blend well. Since I can’t return it I wet a brush and that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage. Check sizing!
customer_reviews.text: They sell this small one at the price of the full sized product. My mistake for not checking the size. But over all I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great underage concealer
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. Just a small amount covers dark circles
customer_reviews.author: PSams

customer_reviews.title: Tiny tube.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe this. I have bought this concealer before and it was not this small size. I paid 20.00 for this little tiny tube. I’m not happy about this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trial Size; horrible value!
customer_reviews.text: Cost of the regular sized bottle at Ulta: $25 Price of the super small “trial size”’from Amazon: $20 You do the math.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Pletcher

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY!  WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst eye makeup ever. Its so thick you cant even smooth it out. You might as well wear criso mixed with glue. BTW, its in the trash...
customer_reviews.author: J. Thayer

customer_reviews.title: Half empty tube!!
customer_reviews.text: Order through ULTA...this is a trial size shouldn't even be for sale! And the tube is half empty...very disappointed with what I received for the price. Total ripoff!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s the travel size = Ulta $12
customer_reviews.text: It’s the travel size that sells on Ulta for $12
customer_reviews.author: Txredhead

customer_reviews.title: Empty package!
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived empty. No product was enclosed even though package was sealed.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Lost its grip - fast
customer_reviews.text: I do hot yoga and was excited to use this mat, which is known to be non-slip. I've only used it for a few weeks though and already it's lost its grip.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, got it as a tester, fell in love, then found it on Amazon at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: All I really use on my face. Blends and builds well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Why
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample tube..28.00...cant go to Utla now so I ordered.I was shocked to see what i got! The tube in store is small but this you need a microscope to see. What's up?
customer_reviews.author: Doris F. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Complete coverage
customer_reviews.text: Fixes everything and anything - heavy coverage means it’s thick but it works
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Travel size - not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this product and it works great, but I’m Very disappointed that this was the travel size for this price. You can get this from Ulta for $12 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Great matte coverage. I have a light color for winter and I get the med when I'm tan in the summertime 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Great all day coverage! You only need a dab and it goes a long way. Great at hiding dark circles. My favorite concealer!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Great natural coverage
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of putting this on. It’s so smooth and covers my bags!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this under eye
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It only takes a small amount and hides the bags under your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Love

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is suppose to do; and does it well!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: My favorite concealer.
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this from Ipsy and fell in love with it. By far my favorite concealer I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Laura L Parker

customer_reviews.title: Greatest under eye cover up on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest under eye cover up for dark circles on the market!
customer_reviews.author: SBurton

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Only need to use a small amount and you get great coverage. Stays on all day. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small size
customer_reviews.text: False advertising. Very small size but the price of a full size bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Twisterred

customer_reviews.title: High performance
customer_reviews.text: IT makes the best concealers and foundations, perfect for combination skin. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dorene

customer_reviews.title: Make up
customer_reviews.text: Were is my refund it's not on my amazon store card of 21 dollars
customer_reviews.author: Anthony delgigante,

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.text: This product was way too small for the price. I do not recommend buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: anonymously

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coverage. light feel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect coverage without feeling like you have a ton of makeup on
customer_reviews.author: Dustielena

customer_reviews.title: Tube size/price
customer_reviews.text: Very small tube for the price Obviously, need to use sparingly
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Product does exactly what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: It works like a charm. Easy to blend onto skin. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Petra

customer_reviews.title: Look like a fool
customer_reviews.text: Came back to read reviews after trying this for a few days. Was I applying it wrong? Thick, chalky paste that has an peach undertone. I tried it with eye gel, eye gel and primer, and just the concealer. Each time there would be peachy “rivers” of concealer pooling up in my fine lines. I’ve never tried such a horrible concealer. At worst, most make eyeliner bleed or make skin too powdery. This accentuated every flaw. Even dark circles appeared darker. The Maybelline concealer stick is not perfect. But it’s a better product than this.
customer_reviews.author: brady @ fresh face skin studio

customer_reviews.title: Terrible value. Sad sample size surprise
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this product from my local makeup store for several years & rely on it for the bright flawless fresh look it achieves. Then I moved & had to resort to buying this online. Because of the photos provided by this online retailer, I was expecting the same size tube as every other one I have purchased from a real store. This crazy joke of a sample size tube has only .11 Oz when every other tube I paid slightly more for has .88 Oz. I could probably salvage more product by cutting open the old tube & scraping what is stuck to the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bateman

customer_reviews.title: Natural look all by itself
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use concealer because I haven't found a product that doesn't looked caked-on or sink into fine lines. My cousin had me try some of her product and I had to have it for myself. A tiny amount goes a long way for full coverage and it looks very natural without even having to use powder on top. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is my new favorite and I have tried a dozen brands over the last 5 years. I use a brush with a little Cetaphil face cream to apply it. I am 61 so my skin is thinning. I also have some fine lines/wrinkles from a life well lived. I wear L’Oreal TruMatch Creamy Natural C3 Foundation and this seems to blend best with it. L’Oréal’s concealer didn’t cover as well and their powder that I wore for years now settles on my fine lines. Aw Aging!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Rushing, Rushing To Meet Your Needs

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I am always skeptical when it comes to cosmetics (especially covering my undereye bags), but this product is phenomenal! You only need the tiniest drop and it gets amazing coverage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than most!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for oily skin! Definitely better than most concealers, you don't need much product that's for sure so don't let the size of the tube fool you! After about 2hrs I had lines under my eyes, but I have very oily skin. Yes I used a setting powder over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Reduced product packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. However, the mfg. of this product reduced the amt significantly and left the price the same. Therefore, I will look for a new product since this is a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: SmokyBears

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for the older woman
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this product. By the time, I decided to return it my husband throw out the packaging. It is too heavy for the older woman. Our under eye area is so delicate and this definitely had a pulling effect.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy A. Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: This might be a knock off product. it is very thick, very hard to smooth across the under-eye area. not natural-looking, minimal coverage of blue tones. For me it's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jeb

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to give this a try. Had been hearing and reading about it for years. Just a small amount is needed and it works so much better that anything I've tried over the years. So happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie Kmetz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the amount you get for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought it’s 1/4 of the amount Of product I usually receive when I purchase elsewhere very disappointed and it cost the same as the .40 ounce
customer_reviews.author: victoria

product_meta.title: Bye Bye Under Eye Full Coverage Anti-Aging Waterproof Concealer (0.11 FL OZ, Light Natural)
product_meta.description: Size:0.11 Fl Oz| Color:Light NaturalUnder Eye Full Coverage Anti-Aging Waterproof Concealer delivers highly pigmented full coverage that lasts through sweat and humidity for up to 24 hours without creasing or cracking.
